name: Pass the $20 (Demo)
description:
Pass the $20 is currently in development. The following is a demo of the game, illustrating proof of concept and most of one character route. 

This is a game about queer solidarity, friendship, and maybe love. It's about that phenomenon many of us are intimately familiar with, of passing the same money around in a circle to help keep each other afloat. It's about kindness. I hope you enjoy this demo.

Edit: Due to an overwhelming response, I'm just going to add that if you donate $20 or over on from the demo, you get the full game for free at launch. It was going to have a $20 price point anyway, so!! As long as you leave an email, I can send you out your copy when I'm all done!!
